MS MCQs

    Get started with security roles in Dataverse

    »

    1. Which of the following is not a User Security role?

      Application Administrator

      Delegate

      Microsoft Dataverse User

      System Customizer


    2. Which of the following statements is true about users?

      You can’t add users to access data in Dataverse.

      Public users outside of your Azure Active Directory can access Dataverse data.

      You can enable anonymous access to any data in Dataverse.

      You can add users to access data in Dataverse from within your Azure Active Directory.


    3. Adding a user to Dataverse automatically assigns that user to all the following roles except which one?

      Dataverse User

      Environment Maker

      System Customizer
